channel.title: Clojure on The Weekly Challenge - Perl & Raku
channel.description: Recent content in Clojure on The Weekly Challenge - Perl & Raku

item.title: The Weekly Challenge - Guest Contributions
item.description: As you know, The Weekly Challenge, primarily focus on Perl and Raku. During the Week #018, we received solutions to “The Weekly Challenge - 018” by Orestis Zekai in Python. It was pleasant surprise to receive solutions in something other than Perl and Raku. Ever since regular team members also started contributing in other languages like Ada, APL, Awk, Basic, Bash, Bc, Befunge, Bourne Shell, BQN, Brainfuck, C3, C, CESIL, Chef, COBOL, Coconut, C Shell, C++, Clojure, Crystal, D, Dart, Elm, Erlang, Excel VBA, Fish, Forth, Fortran, Gembase, GNAT, Go, Haskell, Haxe, HTML, Idris, IO, J, Janet, Java, JavaScript, Kotlin, Lisp, Logo, Lua, M4, Macro Processor, Miranda, MMIX, Mumps, Myrddin, Nim, Nix, Node.

item.title: Meet The Champion: March 2021
item.description: Get to know about Tyler Wardhaugh Welcome to the monthly series Meet The Champion. Last month we spoke to Aaron Smith, the winner of April 2021. Today we are talking to Tyler Wardhaugh, the winner of March 2021 of The Weekly Challenge. I hope you are going to enjoy the interview. Mohammad: Tell us about your technical background? Tyler: I began my career doing web development in the early ’90s.
